mapper.select: select a.*, b.RECRUITANNOUNCE_TITLE, b.RECRUITANNOUNCE_STARTDATE, b.RECRUITANNOUNCE_ENDDATE, b.RECRUITANNOUNCE_SCARRER, b.RECRUITANNOUNCE_SWORKKIND, b.RECRUITANNOUNCE_SPAY from RECRUITANNOUNCEBOOKMARK a join RECRUITANNOUNCE b on a.RECRUITANNOUNCE_NO=b.RECRUITANNOUNCE_NO where a.user_no=#{userNo} order by RECRUITANNOUNCEBOOKMARK_NO desc
